description: Learn how to make hash browns in your air fryer with this easy recipe. Serve them with eggs cooked your way and a side of veg for a brekkie worth waking up for.
name: Air-Fryer Hash Brown Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly spray air-fryer basket with oil. Spoon potato mixture into basket and press with a spatula to form a 1.5cm-thick round. Slide pan and basket into air fryer. Set timer for 20 minutes, turning hash brown halfway through cooking, or until golden. Stand for 10 minutes, then transfer to a board. Serve topped with yoghurt and parsley.
